org.araneaframework.http.support
Class FallbackResourceBundle

java.lang.Object
  java.util.ResourceBundle
      org.araneaframework.http.support.FallbackResourceBundle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultResourceBundle
public class FallbackResourceBundle
extends java.util.ResourceBundle
implements java.io.Serializable

ResourceBundle that which handleGetObject(String) searches for key from all added ResourceBundles.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:

handleGetObject

protected java.lang.Object handleGetObject(java.lang.String key)
Returns the resource under the key. Resource is searched among all ResourceBundles this FallbackResourceBundle knows about, in same order as ResourceBundles were added.

Returns:
the resource under the key
